titleStmt.title: Foure sermons of Maister Iohn Caluin entreating of matters very profitable for our time, as may bee seene by the preface: with a briefe exposition of the LXXXVII. Psalme. Translated out of Frenche into Englishe by Iohn Fielde.
Quatre sermons avec exposition du Pseaume 87. English
titleStmt.author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
Fielde, John, d. 1588.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Thomas Dawson] for Thomas Man, dwelling in Pater Noster Rowe, at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Quatre sermons avec exposition du Pseaume 87.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pater Noster Rowe, at the signe of the Talbot
